Comment.Language: During the Morning Raising of Incense (Psalm 67:1, 2):

Text.Language: V] efe~senh/t qaron efe~c~mou e~ron: e~feouwnh m~pefho e~h~r/i e~jwn ouoh efe~ nai nan.
God shall pity us, and bless us, and reveal His face upon us and have mercy on us;
لِيَتَرََّأفِ اللهُ عَلَيْنَا وَلْيُبَارِكْنَا، وَلْيُضِيءْ بِوَجْهِهِ عَلَيْنَا.
Ep~jin couen m~pekmwit hijen p~kahi: nem pek oujai qen nieynoc t/rou.
that Your way may be known on the earth, Your salvation among all nations.
لِكَيْ يُعْرَفَ فِي الأَرْضِ طَرِيقُكَ، وَبَيْنَ جَمِيعِ الأُمَمِ خَلاَصُكَ.
